title: Veer does it right
content:
they have a teeshirt that is a benefit for the huricane affected people of New Orleans. Good for them. We might need a teeshirt benefit for the riots in France if it keeps up.

as the designer of said t-shirt, i’m pleased to say i hear they’ve been selling really well.

it’s an odd thing though; after receiving the call to help out for this one, the earthquake in Kashmir struck, and ... well, it just seems to be one disaster after another in this old world. it would seem we need a lot more t-shirts to put a lot more pennies in those big wells of misfortune.

-marian
